list_definition.definition: the state or act of improving or being improved

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: There has been a great improvement in her work
The patient’s condition shows some improvement.

list_definition.definition: something which improves, or adds beauty, value etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I’ve made several improvements to the house.

list_ex_of_english: Experiments evaluating the effects of isoproteronol on tissue removed from the heart at surgery demonstrated initial inhibition of contraction with improvements over time.
The results showed significant improvement after training across age groups.
These improvements in the outcome of pregnancy, nonetheless, concomitantly increase the genetic risk in the surviving population.
Demonstration of these improvements is planned for the near future.
We incline to think that the latter change, in contrast to the former, represents a cognitive improvement in our condition.
The farmers provided various suggestions for possible improvements in the distribution of available irrigation water.
However, unlike technology improvements, optimal tariffs will hurt the poor region.
Participants in both intervention and control groups showed significant improvement in mood symptoms over time.
